i-engile: Isithuba esiphakathi kwemigca emibini okanye iinqwelomoya ezidibanayo
radian: Iyunithi ye-engile yendiza ilingana ne-engile kumbindi wesangqa esithotywe yi-arc ilingana nobude kwiradiyasi.
sine: Umlinganiselo wobude becala elichasene ne-engile enikiweyo ukuya kubude be-hypotenuse kanxantathu osekunene
cosine: Umyinge wecala elikufutshane kwi-hypotenuse kanxantathu osekunene
tangent: Umgca ochukumisa igophe kwindawo enye kuphela
secant: Umgca othe ngqo onqumla igophe kumanqaku amabini nangaphezulu
Ithiyori yepythagorean: Unxulumano olusisiseko kwijometri ye-Euclidean phakathi kwamacala amathathu kanxantathu wasekunene
umsebenzi ngamaxesha: Umsebenzi ophinda amaxabiso awo ngamaxesha athile
ubukhulu: Ubukhulu bokufuduswa okanye umgama oshukunyiswa linqaku kumzimba ongcangcazelayo okanye amaza
umlinganiselo wesidanga: Umlinganiselo we-angle kwiidigri, apho isangqa esipheleleyo sahlulwe kwii-360 degrees
